case_title: Mst. BIBI LAL BIBI vs MIR BALUCH KHAN AND Another

key_points.dispute: Partition of landed property left by Sardar Nauroze Khan and Sardar Yaqoob Khan
key_points.initial_suit: Filed by Bibi Lal Bibi on 1953-10-08
key_points.appeal_remand: Majlis-e-Shura remanded case to Kazi for decision on merits
key_points.kazi_decision: Partition decree for immovable property passed on 1959-04-18
key_points.majlis_shura_decision: Set aside Kazi's decree and remanded for further evidence
key_points.final_court_decision: Restored Kazi's decree and set aside Majlis-e-Shura's order

legal_provisions.interim_constitution: Section 86 of Interim Constitution of Baluchistan States Union, 1952
legal_provisions.civil_procedure_code: Section 86 of Pakistan Civil Procedure Code, 1908

partition_details.property_source: Settlement deed of 1883 by Sardar Azad Khan
partition_details.excluded_properties: Gifted properties or those given in lieu of shares
